summary: Internal FBI email chain from October 30, 2019, discussing efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails indicate a subpoena was issued for phone tolls, a Pen Register/Trap and Trace (PRTT) was active, and an IP address associated with Maxwell was hitting in Pawtucket, Rhode Island the previous day.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the FBI's location efforts; a subpoena was issued for tolls on her phone and a PRTT was active to track her.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: Asks about known addresses for Maxwell and her suspected location in Rhode Island.

connections.description: The FBI agent is actively investigating and attempting to locate Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Maxwell's IP address hits in Pawtucket, RI
events.description: An IP address associated with Ghislaine Maxwell was detected in Pawtucket, Rhode Island.

events.title: PRTT on Maxwell's phone goes active
events.description: A Pen Register/Trap and Trace (PRTT) surveillance order on Ghislaine Maxwell's phone became active.

events.title: Subpoena issued for Maxwell's phone tolls
events.description: A subpoena was issued to obtain toll records (call detail records) for Ghislaine Maxwell's phone.

keyFacts: As of October 30, 2019, the FBI was actively trying to locate Ghislaine Maxwell and had no known addresses for her in Rhode Island.
A subpoena had been issued for toll records on Maxwell's phone, and a Pen Register/Trap and Trace (PRTT) was active on her phone as of October 29, 2019.
On October 29, 2019, an IP address associated with Maxwell was detected in Pawtucket, Rhode Island, but there were no new location hits as of October 30.
